sentences.en: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.cn: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.en: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.cn: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

sentences.en: For help on crime prevention, call our 24-hour advice line.
sentences.cn: 若想获得预防犯罪方面的帮助，请拨打我们的24小时咨询热线。

sentences.en: He insisted that he had not committed any crime.
sentences.cn: 他坚持说自己没有犯任何罪行。

sentences.en: He wrote 54 crime novels, which spawned both movies and television shows.
sentences.cn: 他写了54部侦探小说，很多被改编成了电影和电视剧。

sentences.en: Her life has been per-manently blighted by his heinous crime.
sentences.cn: 他犯下的滔天罪行给她的生活蒙上了永久的阴影。

sentences.en: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 这是间谍罪，应判死刑。

sentences.en: men who have been found guilty of violent crimes
sentences.cn: 被判犯有暴力罪行的男子

sentences.en: Petty crime is having a deleteri-ous effect on community life.
sentences.cn: 轻微罪行正对社区生活产生有害影响。

sentences.en: Photographs of the crime scene began to arrive within twenty minutes.
sentences.cn: 不到20分钟，犯罪现场的照片就开始传来了。

sentences.en: Police are still busy hunting for clues at the scene of the crime (= where the crime happened ) .
sentences.cn: 警方仍忙着在犯罪现场寻找线索。

sentences.en: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.cn: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.en: Somewhat ingenuously, he explains how the crime may be accomplished.
sentences.cn: 他有点天真地解释了这一罪行可能是如何实施的。

sentences.en: Statistically our chances of being the victims of violent crime are remote.
sentences.cn: 从统计数据来看，我们成为暴力犯罪受害者的可能性微乎其微。

sentences.en: The crime was so base that everyone wanted to hush it up.
sentences.cn: 这一罪行如此卑鄙无耻，大家都不想声张出去。

sentences.en: The President described the killings as an abominable crime.
sentences.cn: 总统称这些血案为令人发指的罪行。

sentences.en: The sum of evidence points to the crime resting on them.
sentences.cn: 所有证据都表明该犯罪乃他们所为.

sentences.en: There is very little stigma attached to crime and criminals.
sentences.cn: 人们几乎都不把犯罪和罪犯视为一种耻辱。

sentences.en: They refuse to do anything about the real cause of crime: poverty.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝采取措施解决引发犯罪的真正问题：贫穷。

sentences.en: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.cn: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.en: Within criminal law almost anything could be defined as "crime".
sentences.cn: 在刑法中，几乎任何行为都可以被界定为“犯罪”。

sentences.en: You begin to ask yourself what kind of person perpetrated this crime.
sentences.cn: 你开始自问是什么样的人犯下这样的罪行。

words.tran_cn: 控告的；使负罪的；责难的

phrases.tran_cn: 违反人道罪；危害人类罪

trans.tran_cn: 罪行，犯罪活动，严重错误，罪过
